body: @iizukak Yes, It is high priority. So many people ask us when the Sem Seg is supported.

issue.title: Add Semantic Segmentation Interface

repository.name: blueoil
repository.description: Bring Deep Learning to small devices

issue.body: ## Motivation and Context This PR implement #88. You can use Semantic Segmentation from blueoil entry point. ## Description In this PR, theses features are implemented. - Enable `semantic_segmentation` task from blueoil entry script. - Implement `CamvidBase` and `CamvidCustom` classes. - Make `Camvid` class inherit `CamvidBase` class. - Make `CamvidCustom` class inherit `StoragePathCustomizable` and `CamvidBase`. - `StoragePathCustomizable` are required to separate dataset for training and test if user only have training dataset. - Unit Tests for these classes. - This test include very reduced `Camvid` and `CamvidCustom` dataset. - Write `CamvidCustom` documentation. ## How has this been tested? ### Unit test I added `test_camvid.py` for unit testing. In this script, `Camvid` and `CamvidCustom` class's basic functionality are tested. `CamvidCustom` may be only contain training dataset. `DummyCamvidCustomWithoutTestDataset` is that case. `_show_image_with_annotation` function are debug helper script. To see original and annotated image, please comment out `#` in these lines. https://github.com/blue-oil/blueoil/pull/93/files#diff-9fbc1734a50a11ddf3811d724af7508eR71 https://github.com/blue-oil/blueoil/pull/93/files#diff-9fbc1734a50a11ddf3811d724af7508eR83 You can see like this. ### [WIP] Manualy test I tested `Camvid` and `CamvidCustom`datases with manual experiment. #### CamvidCustom - Config file - Screenshot of tensorboard #### Camvid - Config file - Screenshot of tensorboard To be written. ## Types of changes - [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue) - [x] New feature / Optimization (non-breaking change which adds functionality) - [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected) ## Checklist: - [x] My change requires a change to the documentation. - [x] I have updated the documentation accordingly.

body:
I did some experiments with CamVid dataset. I found semantic segmentation dose not work well with momentum optimizer. Adam works well. So I decided to add optimizer selection feature first.

See #138 

After optimizer selector implemented. I'll back to this issue.

I made [PR](https://github.com/blue-oil/blueoil/pull/93) for this issue. 

But it is so Big. And I'll separete that PR for smaller PRs (maybe 4 or 5).

I wrote how to separate, here.
https://github.com/blue-oil/blueoil/issues/88#issue-396365721

issue.body:
<!--- 👉👉👉 Provide a general summary of your changes. 👈👈👈 -->

## Motivation and Context

This PR is part of #88
Based on #189 

## Description

- Implement `CamvidBase` class
- Implement `CamvidCustom` class
- Make `Cmavid` class inhert `CamvidBase` class

`CamvidCustom` class has `labels.txt`.
`labels.txt` can include `Ignore` label. `Ignore` label should be ignore when training. This PR also include `Ignore` label test.

## How has this been tested?

Write unit test for `Camvid` and `CamvidCustom.`

## Types of changes

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [x] New feature / Optimization (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)

## Checklist:

- [ ] My change requires a change to the documentation.
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly.
